description:
RFC 7523, Section 2.1, Using JWTs as a means for requesting an OAuth 2.0 access token.
The following example demonstrates an access token request with a JWT as an authorization grant :

POST /token HTTP/1.1
grant_type=urn:ietf:params:oauth:grant-type:jwt-bearer&assertion=|signed-JWT-token|

publicKey.title: Public key
publicKey.description: SSH public key (ssh-(rsa|dsa) ([A-Za-z0-9/+]+=*) (.*)) used to verify assertion payload integrity.

token_claim.title: Token claim
token_claim.description: Claim that will be added to End-User claims
